title: 😊 Welcome to Valley View!
body: Thanks for joining the world of Valley View. Here's a little something to get you started.

title: Just another day in Valley View!
body: Don't forget to enjoy the day :)

title: 🚂 Train Shipment Complete!
body: Your settlement filled all Train orders. Great teamwork! Here's your reward.

title: 🙏 Thank You for Your Purchase!
body: Here are the items you purchased from the Store.

title: 🗓️ Season Reward
body: For the top 3 players across the Frontier last season.

title: 🗓️ Season Reward
body: For all players in the top Settlement last season.
